title: bOdhendra gurumUrti
sahitya:
bOdhEndra gurumUrti shIr pAda ninaivilE tIrum namatArtti


anupallavi

  dvaita advaita vishiSTAdvaita bhEdangaL aghala bhuviyil avataritta 


caraNam    pAmarargaL paNDitarum uyya aruL parama sulabha sAdhanam enru
bhAgavatam shol bhakta sukamuni pagarnda tattuvam shivarAma krSNa
nAma kIrtanamE ihapara sukham tarum nAmanaiyum vellalAm enru
namakkirangi eLiya vazhi kATTiya kAmakOTi pIThAlankrtaa shrIman
